english.segment1: it's too late to say ok, you didn't mean it now. oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh. maybe it's me, your words make you look envious O. say what i mean to you now. sing it with me. ooh
english.segment2: shake shake it shake it off, i'm gonna. shake shake it shake it off, aiight
english.segment3: you speak in lies and hate just like a killer would. O I cant take it, take it, fake it, I cant make it, make it, cause Im. Shakin, shakin, from words like bullets. say what i mean to you now. sing it with me. Oh, oh
english.segment4: your methods seem to me like surgery. you can fire away but your words ricochet
